All Classes

  • Class Description
    AcceptableTypes
    Container class used in Controller to store accepted information from the client.
    AckEvent
    Socket event used to acknowledge the Server after a PingUpdate is received.
    Action
    Represent the actions that the Player can do; in order, the player can: Move - Grab - Reload - Shoot
    ActionButtons
    Buttons that allow choosing actions or requesting info during the game.
    ActionController
    Handles the flow for an action.
    ActionControllerTest  
    ActionType
    Represent the type of action that the single Effect can be composed of.
    Ammo
    Possible contents of ammoCards and used for activating weapons / powerUps
    AmmoCard
    Represents an AmmoCard, made by Ammo, following Adrenalina's rules.
    AmmosTakenUpdate
    Represent Ammos Card taken from a tile and replaced with a new one
    Area
    Represent the different areas targeted by a Target ROOM: All targets in a Room TILE: All targets in a Tile SINGLE: Only maxTargets target
    AsciiBoard
    Utility class to draw the board on the terminal
    AsciiPlayer
    Handles the drawing of the information about the displayed player
    AsciiTile
    Handles the drawing of a single tile, and its related info.
    AsciiWeapon
    Handles the drawing of a weapon, and its info.
    AssetMaps
    An utility class containing all the maps related to the assets used in the game
    Attack
    Allows the player to attack using a weapon.
    AttackPlayerUpdate
    Represent attack from and to any player
    AuthenticationErrorException
    Exception used to indicate error during initial connection.
    Board
    Contains tiles and keeps track of: killShotRewards Skulls Ammos and Weapons and PowerUps deck
    Board.Builder
    Builder class to build Board
    BoardCreator
    Parser used for reading configuration files for a Board.
    BoardCreatorTest  
    BoardFX
    Represents a generic board.
    BoardScreen
    Represent the main screen visualized during the game and allow communication between the view and the various graphical elements that compose this screen.
    BoardTest  
    BotCliHandler
    Handles the creation of a fake player that choose randomly between the options that the server propose him.
    BotMain
    Main class to start a bot with the default options
    CardCreator
    Parser used for reading configuration files for PowerUps and Weapons
    CardCreatorTest  
    Choice
    Blocking class to wait for client interaction It joins on TimerConstrainedEventHandler, that will update this object with the received object from client
    CLI
    Command Line Interface to display the View on the terminal
    ClientAcker
    Class used by client controller to send ack periodically to the server
    ClientMain  
    ClientSocket
    ClientSocket, need to be inside EventUpdaterSocket and used to send events to connected server.
    CliInputHandler
    Handles the input from the client in command line interface, supporting: Choosing between CLI or GUI Connection to the server and logging in Selecting an options allowed from the backend Showing info about the current state of the game, such as display another player's info
    Color
    Represent the possible colors of Rooms in the Board
    ConcreteViewReceiver
    Concrete class that receives updates from model.
    ConcreteViewReceiverHelper
    Helper functions class to prevent code duplication in ConcreteViewReceiver
    ConnectHandler
    Handler exposed by the RMI server to the client so that it can request to connect
    ConnectInterface
    Interface exposed by the RMI server to the client so that it can request to connect
    ConnectionRequest
    Socket message used for communicating a request of login.
    DamagedController
    Handles the use of a PowerUp with PowerUp.applicability equal to DAMAGED Handles effects with an arbitrary amount of marks and/or damages.
    DamagedControllerTest  
    DealDamage
    Handles a DealDamage subAction in an Effect.
    DealDamage.Builder  
    Deck<T>
    Interface for drawing and discarding into the deck.
    Direction
    Represent the possible direction in which the Weapon is shooting Used in cardinal weapons
    DominationBoardFX
    Represents a domination board used in domination mode.
    DominationMatch
    Contains and supports the information for the flow of a Match in domination mode.
    DominationMatchTest  
    Door
    Represent a connection between two adjacent tile
    Effect
    Represent the actions that can be activated shooting with a Weapon
    Effect.Builder  
    EffectController
    This class contains all the logic related to the execution of an effect.
    EffectControllerFramework  
    EffectControllerTest  
    EventDeserializer
    Deserializer class used to deserialize EventVisitable Need a new case in the switch for every new EventVisitable added to the logic For nested custom Objects, it may be necessary to implement custom parsing
    EventHandler
    Generic interface used to handle the receiving of various events from the client.
    EventHelper
    Helper class with useful methods to parse the content of event messages.
    EventHelperTest  
    EventSerializer
    Serialize EventVisitable in a json having as the type, the name of the class serialized.
    EventUpdater
    Sender interface used by the view to send chosen events to controller.
    EventUpdaterRMI
    Implements the event Updater, allowing a client using RMI to send event to server
    EventUpdaterSocket
    Implements the EventUpdater, allowing clients using socket to send events to the server
    EventVisitable
    Visitable class representing the events that can be sent from the client to the server, using socket.
    EventVisitor
    Visitor used by socket server implementation that apply events received on a RequestDispatcher.
    FinalScreen
    The final screen shown to the players after the game ended
    FurnaceInteractionTest  
    GameController
    Controller class related to a single game.
    GameControllerTest  
    GameProperties
    Singleton class defining the properties of the game.
    Grab
    Allows the player to grab a Weapon or an AmmoCard
    GuiHelper
    An utility class containing static methods used repeatedly in the GUI.
    GUIView
    Extends the view to provide the proper methods for drawing communication with the rest of the GUI.
    IncorrectEventException
    Exception used to communicate to the view a wrong event
    InfoAlert
    An alert of which only and instance can be shown on screen at any time.
    InvalidUpdateException
    Exception used to indicate a wrong update received from the server.
    LimitedDeck<T>
    Handles drawing cards from a limited Queue.
    LobbyController
    Manage new Players connection and reconnections.
    LobbyControllerTest  
    LobbyTask
    Handles the start of the game after the delay defined in LobbyController.
    Logger
    Utility class to log errors and debug info.
    LoginScreen
    A login screen used to start a new game.
    Match
    Container class for all the information of the Match being played.
    MatchTest  
    Mode
    Different modes that can be used for playing the game
    ModelToViewConverter
    Helper class to convert model classes to view counterpart without having to import model in view
    Moment
    Situation during which the PowerUp can be activated
    Move
    Allows movement in the board from the player.
    Move
    Supports a subAction in an effect that allows the movement of player(s).
    Move.Builder  
    MovePlayerUpdate
    Represent movement of any player to new coordinates
    NetworkTimeoutControllerClient
    Utility class to expect an ack in return from the server, every NetworkTimeoutControllerClient.timeout.
    NetworkTimeoutControllerServer
    Utility class to expect an ack in return from the client, every NetworkTimeoutControllerServer.timeout.
    NormalMatch
    Contains and supports the information for the flow of a Match in standard mode.
    NormalMatchTest  
    ObjectToMove
    Indicates what object the current Move is moving.
    Observer
    Generic Controller - observer class used for receiving the updates from the RequestDispatcher
    PaymentController
    Handles the payment of ammos.
    PaymentControllerTest  
    PingUpdate
    Represent a ping sent from the server
    Player
    Contains information related to the player, necessary to the state of the game.
    PlayerBoardFX
    Represents a player board displaying all the player's ammunition, damages, marks and the weapons that aren't loaded.
    PlayerTest  
    PointOfView
    OWN: physical position of the attacking player PERSPECTIVE: virtual position of the attacking player LASTPLAYER: position of the last attacked player in TargetList TARGET: position of selected target player
    PopupMessageUpdate
    Represent message that must be shown to player, e.g. after an invalid request by the player
    PowerUp
    Contains the information to handle to computing of a PowerUp.
    PowerUp.Builder  
    PowerUpsBox
    Represents a box containing all the powerUps that the player currently owns and contains the methods used to highlight and select them.
    Priority
    Defines the priority of the error message in the Logger
    RailgunInteractionTest  
    ReceivingType
    Types that define what the RequestDispatcher can accept.
    ReconnectionScreen
    A screen displayed to the player in case of lost connection.
    Reload
    Last action in the turn when final frenzy mode is not activated.
    RequestDispatcher
    Dispatcher class used by the VirtualView to allow the use of a EventHandler for each Receiving type; if null, the type can't be accepted.
    RequestDispatcherInterface
    Interface used by RMI server to receive updates
    RequestDispatcherTest  
    RMIPinger
    Class used by server controller to send ping periodically to the client, which should reply with an ack
    RMIServer
    Creates WorkerServerRMI and export it on the RMI registry.
    RocketLauncherInteractionTest  
    SelectableOptions<T>
    Utility class representing selectable options.
    SelectableOptionsUpdate
    Represent the wrapper containing the options that the client can select
    SelectableOptionsWrapper
    Wrapper to contain the options selectable for the Client.
    SelectAction
    Event used by view to choose from its available actions
    SelectAmmo
    Event used by view to choose an ammo
    SelectDirection
    Event used by view when the player can choose a cardinal direction to attack
    SelectEffect
    Event used by view to choose from its available effects of the current weapon
    SelectPlayers
    Event used by view to select players it wants to select
    SelectPowerUps
    Event used by view after choosing at least one powerup to use its effects or to pay a cost
    SelectRoom
    Event used by view after choosing a Room, e.g. when it can attack a room and must decide from the possible ones
    SelectStop
    Event used by view in two cases: player does not want to do anything else in its turn player wants to undo his entire current action -
    SelectTiles
    Event used by view after choosing at least one tile, when it can attack every player in a tile or when it can move someone to the sent tiles (selectedTiles shouldn't have more than one tile in this case)
    SelectWeapon
    Event used by view to attack with a weapon or to buy one.
    SenderButton
    A button used to send various lists that could possibly be empty or smaller then the maximum selectable size.
    Server
    Main class to start the server.
    SocketServer
    SocketServer for creating related WorkerServerSocket for each client connecting.
    Spawner
    Controller class used for handling the spawning of dead players.
    SpawnPlayer
    Represents a SpawnPlayer, used in Domination mode.
    Status
    Defines the current status of the View
    SubAction
    Indicates what kind of SubAction is currently being computed.
    Target  
    Target.Builder  
    TextScreen
    Screen used for displaying a message to the player during loading
    ThreeState
    Utility class used to represent ternary logic in operations.
    Tile
    Contains all information needed for a Tile, a single part of a board.
    Tile.Builder  
    TileUpdate  
    TimerConstrainedEventHandler
    Handler class for events received by the client.
    TotalUpdate
    Represent whole View when the game starts or when a player reconnects
    TractorBeamInteractionTest  
    UnlimitedDeck<T>
    Interface drawing cards from an unlimited queue.
    UpdateDeserializer
    Deserializer class used to deserialize UpdateVisitable Need a new case in the switch for every new UpdateVisitable added to the logic For nested custom Objects, it may be necessary to implement custom parsing
    UpdateMessageCreator
    Creates an update message for a specific player
    UpdateSender
    Used by the server to send updates to a player or to all players Default methods with no receivingPlayer will send an update to all online player in the match
    UpdateSerializer
    Serialize UpdateVisitable in a json having as the type, the name of the class serialized.
    UpdateVisitable
    Interface implemented by updates sent with the socket network implementation
    UpdateVisitor
    Visitor class for visiting Socket updates.
    UpdateVisitorTest  
    Utils  
    Utils  
    View
    View used by the clients for: Access info for visualizing the state of the game Receive updates from the {@link #View#receiver} Sending events from the {@link #View#eventUpdater}
    ViewBoard
    Contains all the information necessary for the board in the view
    ViewDoor
    Represent a door between two tiles.
    ViewEffect
    Represent an effect of a ViewWeapon
    ViewPlayer
    Simplified player used by the view, with basic info to display Some attributes are ArrayList because regular List is not Serializable
    ViewPowerUp
    Simplified powerup used by the view, with basic info to display
    ViewReceiverInterface
    Interface for the view that will receive updates from controller/model.
    ViewTile
    Simplified tile used by the view, with basic info to display
    ViewTileCoords
    Position of a viewTile on the map This class allows tiles to be sent without their unnecessary weapons and ammos
    ViewUpdater
    Sender interface used by controller and model to send updates to a view.
    ViewUpdaterRMI
    Sender class used by controller and model to send updates to a linked view via RMI.
    ViewUpdaterSocket
    Updater class used to send Updates from Server to Client using Socket
    ViewWeapon
    Simplified weapon used by the view, with basic info to display
    VirtualView
    Virtual view used by the model and server to: Send updates to the client,using VirtualView.viewUpdater Receive and compute events from the client, using VirtualView.requestDispatcher Every client has its own VirtualView
    Weapon
    Contains the information needed to compute the use of a Weapon, used during an Attack.
    Weapon.Builder  
    WeaponController
    Handles the computing of a Weapon's effects.
    WeaponControllerTest  
    WeaponsBox
    Represents a box containing all the weapons that the player currently owns and contains the methods used to highlight and select them.
    WeaponTakenUpdate
    Represent Weapon Card taken from a spawn tile but not already replaced
    WorkerServerSocket
    Handles each client, containing information needed to: Receiving events and applying them to the related Game Sending updates to them, converted in json files.
